Title: Lync Presence & Chat Widget
Description: The Lync Presence widget shows Lync presence information on your website. Website visitors can start chat conversations using the Lync Chat widget. The widgets are jQuery plugins communicating with a WCF Service. Place them on any kind of website (PHP, .NET) and style with CSS.
HomeWiki:
In the past, we provided a free version of the Lync Widget, including source-code.

We do not offer support on this version anymore. Today we have a new stable version focused on Lync 2013. We offer this product in combination with professional services to install and configure it in your website/portal. You need a Lync 2013 on-premise server (does not work yet with Office 365).

Implementation projects typically cost between 2800 to 4000 EUR excl VAT.

More info on our tariffs can be found on: http://www.orbitone.com/en/how-we-do-it/#1463
